nodes.name: Validate ToolSpec Webhook (DISABLED)
nodes.notes:
RECEIVES: Generated ToolSpec + original Intent
PURPOSE: STRICT validation against tool-spec.schema.json
OUTPUTS: Valid=true OR Valid=false with errors

nodes.name: Load ToolSpec Schema
nodes.notes:
SOURCE: claude-flow/contracts/tool-spec.schema.json
MOUNT: /home/node/.n8n/claude-flow (read-only)
ERROR: If schema missing, halt immediately

nodes.name: Validate ToolSpec Schema
nodes.notes:
VALIDATOR: Ajv (JSON Schema Draft-07)
MODE: STRICT (no coercion, no defaults)
FAIL: Halt on first error
OUTPUT: valid=true OR valid=false with error array

nodes.name: Check ToolSpec Valid
nodes.notes:
IF valid=true: Verify against Intent constraints
IF valid=false: Return 400 with schema errors

nodes.name: Cross-Validate Against Intent
nodes.notes:
CHECK: Rollback strategy, forbidden actions, credentials
CHECK: Output schema alignment, timeout bounds
SEVERITY: Error vs warning
OUTPUT: valid, toolspec, intent, issues

nodes.name: Cross-Validation Failure
nodes.notes:
HALT: Constraint violations are non-recoverable
RETURN: 400 with specific issues
EMIT: RunRecord (failure)

nodes.name: Validation Pass
nodes.notes:
PASS: ToolSpec is valid and ready for compilation
EMIT: RunRecord (validation_success)
RETURN: 200 with validated ToolSpec

nodes.name: Schema Validation Failure
nodes.notes:
HALT: Schema violations are non-recoverable
RETURN: 400 with validation errors
EMIT: RunRecord (failure)

nodes.name: Respond to Webhook
